my:Hazard.my:Description: Worn or inappropriate tools especially tools with moving parts
Working in areas either lacking oxygen or posing a threat to combustion (materials / gasses)
Operating at height - risk of tools / personnel falling
my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: a) Consult ‘Working Aloft’ Risk Assessment. Ensure all appropriate measures are in place and procedures are complied with b) All tools being used aloft must be secured.
a) Consult ‘Working Aloft – Overboard’ Risk Assessment. b) Extra precautions must be in place when operating electrical tools above water in conjunction with risk factor 3 - Electrocution.

a) Protective gloves to be used. b) More frequent breaks and job rotation must be considered to reduce the duration and effects associated with exposure; c) Ensure there is no wear & tear or misalignment of components that could increase exposure levels. d) Consider other available work methods with less or no exposure effects that can be used to complete the task.
